about_the_game:
Snowfallen Survivors Chest, Part III

With a frosty chill setting in over the Constant, many of our Survivors have chosen to embrace the cold. Embody the spirit of winter with all the icy niceties and frozen flair befitting a seasoned seasonal celebrator.

Happy Winter's Feast!

Includes
  • Woodie's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wes' Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Maxwell's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wigfrid's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wurt's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wanda's Snowfallen Skin Set
detailed_description:
Snowfallen Survivors Chest, Part III

With a frosty chill setting in over the Constant, many of our Survivors have chosen to embrace the cold. Embody the spirit of winter with all the icy niceties and frozen flair befitting a seasoned seasonal celebrator.

Happy Winter's Feast!

Includes
  • Woodie's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wes' Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Maxwell's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wigfrid's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wurt's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wanda's Snowfallen Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
